ingredients: 1 package Flatout Spicy Italian Artisan Crust Pizza (contains 6 crusts)

2 cups shredded, cooked chicken (I make a double batch of chicken in the crock pot with a few cups of pasta sauce the day before. The sauce gives it some flavor and I love having some extra cooked chicken on hand to make a quick chicken salad for busy nights).
3 cups tomato sauce – jarred or homemade
